entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
